meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the June 3, 2024 meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on City Manager Search
agenda_items.description: Discuss and consider information regarding the search for the city manager, including desired qualifications, community survey results, employee survey results, and the brochure prepared by Baker Tilly.
